subject: Re: FW: Digital marketing catalogue - Moxi V-312 and Stride V-PR launch

full_threads.body: Great, thank you!
+30 mins added to Momentum tracker.

Hi Christine, 

Confirming the request updates have been completed: https://unitronmarketing.com.au/moxi-v/

Please let us know if there are any further changes.

done updating https://unitronmarketing.com.au/moxi-v/
- social media
- Unitron accessory portfolio

30mins

Hi Chris,

Can you please update the accessory portfolio with the attached?

Thank you,

Christine

@glen can you please assist on this one?

PLEASE NOTE: changes are now live on: https://unitronmarketing.com.au/moxi-v/

Hi Chris,

Please action the below from Nikki.

Thanks,

Christine

Hi Christine,

Can we have all social posts together in one tile?
Awesome, thank you for all your support!

Hi Christine, 

Confirming the push to live for the Unitron updates has been completed: https://unitronmarketing.com.au/moxi-v/

Please review and let us know if there are any further updates.

Thanks Chris,

Nikki, please have a look at your local marketing section and let Chris know if you need anything else updated.

https://staging-unitronmarketing-staging.kinsta.cloud/moxi-v/

Thank you,

Christine
+30 mins added the Momentum tracker

Hi Christine, 

Thanks for the call. Confirming the requested updates have been completed and can be reviewed here: https://staging-unitronmarketing-staging.kinsta.cloud/moxi-v/

Please let us know if there are any further updates.

30mins 
- done removing and updating the tiles

@glen we have received another update for this request please. 
https://staging-unitronmarketing-staging.kinsta.cloud/moxi-v/

1. Section - local marketing
Bring the bottom 'Letter existing client' and 'Letter new client' download into the same name tiles above (screenshot). Clicking download with download both files. 

2. Section - local marketing 
Bring all "ads" together under the top most tile of the same name. (screenshot). One button click downloads all PDFs. 

3. Section - local marketing 
Move tile 'social media' to be placed under section '8 - Website and social media' (screenshot)

20 mins Chris  (phone call and preparing instructions.

Thanks Chris, I have let the relevant team members know of the below.

Have a great weekend!

Christine

Hi Christine, 

Most welcome.

We have the push to live scheduled for 8 Nov, 8.30am. They will be visible shortly after.

Please ensure there are no updates mades to the live website as they will be lost once we push the staging updates live.

Awesome, thank you for all your support with those!

All good to go live on 8 Nov at 8.30am AEDT please.

Thank you,

Christine
+15mins added to harvest.

Hi Christine, 

Thanks, confirming the titles have been updated.
